title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", 1936
medium: Pen and ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: SOUPIERE/PLAN; lower right: J.P./36, 2x1.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Rectangular tureen with rounded corners drawn in plan. Rectangular lid surmounted by a circular plate indicated in green ink and a circular finial indicated in yellow ink. Beneath each corner an unidentified element indicated in green ink. Underdrawing in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", 1936.
1936. Pen and ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-34.
